Dining Chair

Leifarne

$180
Intro

Simple, timeless design that’s still going strong after 40 years in our stores. It’s loved by all ages so we made a grown-up size and a children’s size.

Product Information

Dimensions 52 x 50 x 88 cm.
Materials Polypropylene plastic
Aluminium
Solid birch
Good to know Wipe clean with a cloth dampened in a mild cleaner.
